video.title: Facebook's First Real-Money Gambling App Launched in UK

metadata.meta: Facebook's First Real-Money Gambling App Launched in UK Bingo Friendzy is an app that allows players to compete in a series of bingo and slots games. It will be the first Facebook game to ditch Facebook credits and use real money instead. It will only be available to players over 18 in the UK. ...

video.title: How to delete Facebook activity using iPhone, Android app - CNET How to

metadata.meta: How to delete Facebook activity using iPhone, Android app - CNET How to howto.cnet.com You can now delete unwanted posts from your Facebook Activity Log using the Android or iPhone app. Here's how! From: CNETTV Views: 5034 137 ratings Time: 01:56 More in Science & Technology
